judge_outputs.raw: {"aspect_votes": {"inquiry_quality": "B", "persona_adaptation": "B", "methodology_critique": "B", "plan_completeness": "B", "literature_quality": "B", "actionability_risks": "B", "guideline_adherence": "B"}, "winner": "B", "justification": "System B is significantly better because it provides a concrete, actionable plan with specific steps, timelines, and metrics. System A, while asking good clarifying questions, defers providing any substantive advice until the user answers them, making it less immediately helpful. System B also offers more detailed and relevant literature guidance and risk assessment."}

parsed.justification: System B is significantly better because it provides a concrete, actionable plan with specific steps, timelines, and metrics. System A, while asking good clarifying questions, defers providing any substantive advice until the user answers them, making it less immediately helpful. System B also offers more detailed and relevant literature guidance and risk assessment.
